product.title: Panda Sushi Japanese Kawaii Lunch Bag
product.body_html:
• Description
  • FAQ
  • Shipping

  • Are you looking for a way to spice up your lunchtime?

    Do you love pandas and sushi? Then you will love Panda Sushi Japan Kawaii lunch bags! These adorable lunch bags feature pandas dressed up as different kinds of sushi, from maki and nigiri to temaki.

    They are perfect for carrying your lunch or snacks and keeping them fresh and cool. Panda Sushi Japan cute lunch bags have a spacious interior and a convenient handle. They also have a fun and unique design that changes according to your sushi preference. Whether you like salmon, tuna, or eel, there is a panda sushi for you! Panda Sushi Japan cute lunch bags are the best way to enjoy your lunch with a smile!

    Its size is perfect to fit your lunch box, snacks, fruits, your favorite drink, and other condiments. Lined with thick aluminium foil to keep your food cold or warm for around 4 hours. There is also a small outer pocket to put tissues or thin items like your phone.

    Bag measures: 11x6.5x7in / 28x16.5x18cm


    Light and cute bag for both children and adults 

    You will love seeing your family and friends in excitement when they receive our Lunch bag, so leave an everlasting smile on their faces by surprising them with a cute bag today. A lunch bag they will use for a while!

    If you are interested in more items like this, please check out our website www.kawaiies.com


    Step 1: Use the gentlest cycle available on your washing machine.

  • Step 2: Wash our bag in cold water using mild detergent.

    Step 3: If disinfecting is a concern, use warm water or consider using a product like Lysol Laundry Sanitizer, which is safe on both whites and colors, unlike chlorine bleach.

    Step 4: Place the bag in a launderable mesh bag or duvet cover. Padding the drum of the washer with towels can also add another layer of protection. Recommended!

    Step 5: Air-drying will be the gentlest choice, and a hairdryer turned on low heat can help to fluff up the fur once the bag has reached the just-damp stage (think of it as a finishing touch!)

  • FREE Tracked Shipping to the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, Spain, France, Italy, Austria, Netherlands, and many more. Find out more here: Shipping Policy.


    Packaging time: 1-3 Business days

    Shipping time: 5-20 Business days
